simbad.examples.stocks.description: Please provide some valid stock market symbol like:
simbad.examples.stocks.text1: Stock market example shows how to implement
simbad.examples.stocks.text4: Updating symbol query with different symbol will emit action which updates state with loading flag (reducer) and triggers effect for retrieving of selected stock.
simbad.examples.stocks.text5: Actions are debounced and every subsequent request will cancel previous one using
simbad.examples.stocks.text6: Success or error actions are emitted on request completion. Loading spinner is removed and stock info or error message is displayed.
simbad.examples.stocks.title: Stock market
NgRx is a great state management library but sometimes it can be an overkill to use it in simpler applications with limited routing or state sharing needs.

In these cases we usually reach for solution involving RxJs BehaviorSubject which enables to share our state as an Observable stream while also enabling service to imperatively retrieve and mutate Subjects state imperatively...
This pattern was wrapped and made more convenient by
which is a simple state management with minimalistic API, one way data flow, multiple models support and immutable data exposed as RxJS Observable
You can also add it to your project using

simbad.examples.todos.text3: example with support for adding, toggling, removing and filtering of the todo items.
